GeodesicProj.cpp

00001 /**
00002  * \file GeodesicProj.cpp
00003  * \brief Command line utility for geodesic projections
00004  *
00005  * Copyright (c) Charles Karney (2009, 2010, 2011) <charles@karney.com>
00006  * and licensed under the MIT/X11 License.  For more information, see
00007  * http://geographiclib.sourceforge.net/
00008  *
00009  * Compile with -I../include and link with Geodesic.o GeodesicLine.o
00010  * AzimuthalEquidistant.o Gnomonic.o CassiniSoldner.o
00011  *
00012  * See the <a href="GeodesicProj.1.html">man page</a> for usage
00013  * information.
00014  **********************************************************************/
00015 
00016 #include <iostream>
00017 #include <sstream>
00018 #include <string>
00019 #include <sstream>
00020 #include <fstream>
00021 #include <GeographicLib/Geodesic.hpp>
00022 #include <GeographicLib/AzimuthalEquidistant.hpp>
00023 #include <GeographicLib/CassiniSoldner.hpp>
00024 #include <GeographicLib/Gnomonic.hpp>
00025 #include <GeographicLib/DMS.hpp>
00026 
00027 #include "GeodesicProj.usage"
00028 
00029 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
00030   try {
00031     using namespace GeographicLib;
00032     typedef Math::real real;
00033     bool azimuthal = false, cassini = false, gnomonic = false, reverse = false;
00034     real lat0 = 0, lon0 = 0;
00035     real
00036       a = Constants::WGS84_a<real>(),
00037       f = Constants::WGS84_f<real>();
00038     std::string istring, ifile, ofile;
00039 
00040     for (int m = 1; m < argc; ++m) {
00041       std::string arg(argv[m]);
00042       if (arg == "-r")
00043         reverse = true;
00044       else if (arg == "-c" || arg == "-z" || arg == "-g") {
00045         cassini = arg == "-c";
00046         azimuthal = arg == "-z";
00047         gnomonic = arg == "-g";
00048         if (m + 2 >= argc) return usage(1, true);
00049         try {
00050           DMS::DecodeLatLon(std::string(argv[m + 1]), std::string(argv[m + 2]),
00051                             lat0, lon0);
00052         }
00053         catch (const std::exception& e) {
00054           std::cerr << "Error decoding arguments of " << arg << ": "
00055                     << e.what() << "\n";
00056           return 1;
00057         }
00058         m += 2;
00059       } else if (arg == "-e") {
00060         if (m + 2 >= argc) return usage(1, true);
00061         try {
00062           a = DMS::Decode(std::string(argv[m + 1]));
00063           f = DMS::DecodeFraction(std::string(argv[m + 2]));
00064         }
00065         catch (const std::exception& e) {
00066           std::cerr << "Error decoding arguments of -e: " << e.what() << "\n";
00067           return 1;
00068         }
00069         m += 2;
00070       } else if (arg == "--input-string") {
00071         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00072         istring = argv[m];
00073       } else if (arg == "--input-file") {
00074         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00075         ifile = argv[m];
00076       } else if (arg == "--output-file") {
00077         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00078         ofile = argv[m];
00079       } else if (arg == "--version") {
00080         std::cout
00081           << argv[0]
00082           << ": $Id: 51496b51b757287d246ae4fbccfa278979125e0a $\n"
00083           << "GeographicLib version " << GEOGRAPHICLIB_VERSION_STRING << "\n";
00084         return 0;
00085       } else
00086         return usage(!(arg == "-h" || arg == "--help"), arg != "--help");
00087     }
00088 
00089     if (!ifile.empty() && !istring.empty()) {
00090       std::cerr << "Cannot specify --input-string and --input-file together\n";
00091       return 1;
00092     }
00093     if (ifile == "-") ifile.clear();
00094     std::ifstream infile;
00095     std::istringstream instring;
00096     if (!ifile.empty()) {
00097       infile.open(ifile.c_str());
00098       if (!infile.is_open()) {
00099         std::cerr << "Cannot open " << ifile << " for reading\n";
00100         return 1;
00101       }
00102     } else if (!istring.empty()) {
00103       std::string::size_type m = 0;
00104       while (true) {
00105         m = istring.find(';', m);
00106         if (m == std::string::npos)
00107           break;
00108         istring[m] = '\n';
00109       }
00110       instring.str(istring);
00111     }
00112     std::istream* input = !ifile.empty() ? &infile :
00113       (!istring.empty() ? &instring : &std::cin);
00114 
00115     std::ofstream outfile;
00116     if (ofile == "-") ofile.clear();
00117     if (!ofile.empty()) {
00118       outfile.open(ofile.c_str());
00119       if (!outfile.is_open()) {
00120         std::cerr << "Cannot open " << ofile << " for writing\n";
00121         return 1;
00122       }
00123     }
00124     std::ostream* output = !ofile.empty() ? &outfile : &std::cout;
00125 
00126     if (!(azimuthal || cassini || gnomonic)) {
00127       std::cerr << "Must specify \"-z lat0 lon0\" or "
00128                 << "\"-c lat0 lon0\" or \"-g lat0 lon0\"\n";
00129       return 1;
00130     }
00131 
00132     const Geodesic geod(a, f);
00133     const CassiniSoldner cs = cassini ?
00134       CassiniSoldner(lat0, lon0, geod) : CassiniSoldner(geod);
00135     const AzimuthalEquidistant az(geod);
00136     const Gnomonic gn(geod);
00137 
00138     std::string s;
00139     int retval = 0;
00140     std::cout << std::fixed;
00141     while (std::getline(*input, s)) {
00142       try {
00143         std::istringstream str(s);
00144         real lat, lon, x, y, azi, rk;
00145         std::string stra, strb;
00146         if (!(str >> stra >> strb))
00147           throw GeographicErr("Incomplete input: " + s);
00148         if (reverse) {
00149           x = DMS::Decode(stra);
00150           y = DMS::Decode(strb);
00151         } else
00152           DMS::DecodeLatLon(stra, strb, lat, lon);
00153         std::string strc;
00154         if (str >> strc)
00155           throw GeographicErr("Extraneous input: " + strc);
00156         if (reverse) {
00157           if (cassini)
00158             cs.Reverse(x, y, lat, lon, azi, rk);
00159           else if (azimuthal)
00160             az.Reverse(lat0, lon0, x, y, lat, lon, azi, rk);
00161           else
00162             gn.Reverse(lat0, lon0, x, y, lat, lon, azi, rk);
00163           *output << DMS::Encode(lat, 15, DMS::NUMBER) << " "
00164                   << DMS::Encode(lon, 15, DMS::NUMBER) << " "
00165                   << DMS::Encode(azi, 15, DMS::NUMBER) << " "
00166                   << DMS::Encode(rk, 16, DMS::NUMBER) << "\n";
00167         } else {
00168           if (cassini)
00169             cs.Forward(lat, lon, x, y, azi, rk);
00170           else if (azimuthal)
00171             az.Forward(lat0, lon0, lat, lon, x, y, azi, rk);
00172           else
00173             gn.Forward(lat0, lon0, lat, lon, x, y, azi, rk);
00174           *output << DMS::Encode(x, 10, DMS::NUMBER) << " "
00175                   << DMS::Encode(y, 10, DMS::NUMBER) << " "
00176                   << DMS::Encode(azi, 15, DMS::NUMBER) << " "
00177                   << DMS::Encode(rk, 16, DMS::NUMBER) << "\n";
00178         }
00179       }
00180       catch (const std::exception& e) {
00181         *output << "ERROR: " << e.what() << "\n";
00182         retval = 1;
00183       }
00184     }
00185     return retval;
00186   }
00187   catch (const std::exception& e) {
00188     std::cerr << "Caught exception: " << e.what() << "\n";
00189     return 1;
00190   }
00191   catch (...) {
00192     std::cerr << "Caught unknown exception\n";
00193     return 1;
00194   }
00195 }
